data.oai_dc:dc: PISCO: Physical Oceanography: bottom-mounted ADCP data: Hopkins Marine Station, California, USA (HMS001)

This metadata record describes bottom-mounted ADCP data collected at Hopkins Marine Station, California, USA, by PISCO. Measurements were collected using an RDI 600 kHz Workhorse Sentinel ADCP beginning 2005-12-12. The instrument depth was 019 meters, in an overall water depth of 20 meters (both relative to Mean Sea Level, MSL). The instrument was programmed with a sampling interval of -0.3 minutes and a vertical resolution of 1 meter.
